# Welcome to the StatiCrypt Quarto Demo

This dummy site demonstrates a minimal Quarto website that can later be wrapped with StatiCrypt-powered password protection. Use the navigation bar to explore additional content.

## Why This Site Exists

- Provide a simple baseline for future automation.
- Showcase how Quarto structures multi-page sites.
- Act as a placeholder while secure content is prepared.

## Next Steps

Feel free to replace this text with real content, embed visualizations, or expand the navigation with more pages as your project evolves.
